title: Bears roar back for first playoff win in 15 years
content: Quarterback Caleb Williams came through in his playoff debut, throwing a go-ahead, 25-yard touchdown pass to DJ Moore with 1:43 remaining. The Chicago Bears rallied from an 18-point deficit to defeat the Green Bay Packers 31-27 in the wild-card round.

title: Sources: Bregman to Cubs on 5-year, $175M deal
content: Third baseman Alex Bregman and the Chicago Cubs agreed to a five-year, $175 million contract Saturday, sources told ESPN.

title: C's Brown rips refs after loss: 'I'll take the fine'
content: Celtics star Jaylen Brown was furious with the officiating in his team's 100-95 loss to the Spurs, saying he's tired of not getting the same calls as the opponent.

title: Stafford shows 'MVP stuff' in Rams' clinching drive
content: Matthew Stafford led the Rams to a 34-31 victory over the Panthers on Saturday with a seven-play, 71-yard drive that ended with a touchdown pass to tight end Colby Parkinson.

title: Bears LB Edwards fractures fibula, out for season
content: Chicago linebacker T.J. Edwards will miss the remainder of the Bears' postseason run after he suffered a fractured fibula in the second quarter of his team's stunning 31-27 comeback victory over the Green Bay Packers on Saturday night at Soldier Field.

title: Harbaugh to limit interviews to just a few teams
content: Former Ravens coach John Harbaugh will narrow his options to just a few NFL teams before starting to take interviews for his next potential job, he told Fox Sports.

title: Sources: Yankees, Bellinger talks at an impasse
content: Contract negotiations between the New York Yankees and Cody Bellinger are at an impasse, league sources tell ESPN.

title: Schroder suspended for trying to strike Doncic
content: Kings point guard Dennis Schroder was suspended three games by the NBA for confronting and attempting to hit Luka Doncic after a loss to the Lakers on Dec. 28.

title: üëÄ Offseason guide for all eliminated NFL teams
content: The NFL offseason has arrived for 20 teams. What must each do to have a better season in 2026? We have outlooks, early buzz and predictions.

title: Two overreactions, two big questions: Graziano and Solak make sense of Saturday's wild-card comebacks
content: Is Caleb Williams a future MVP? Do the Rams have secondary problems? We're making sense of each game in the NFL playoffs wild-card round.

title: Our guide to four remaining wild-card games: Matchup previews, bold predictions, more
content: Bills-Jaguars? Niners-Eagles? Chargers-Pats? Texans-Steelers? We have picks, predictions and stats to know.

title: FA Cup biggest shock ever: Macclesfield stun holders Palace
content: In a competition known for shocking results, the FA Cup produced its biggest Saturday in its 154-year history.

title: 'Not sure why they felt the need': NBA execs on the Trae deal and trade season's next move
content: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst survey the league on the Young deal and what comes next for the Wizards and Hawks.

title: Men's: A weak nonconference slate could doom Georgia
content: The Bulldogs are a few SEC losses away from the wrong side of the bubble due to a number of low-quality wins.

title: Women's: Why LSU's seed could be determined in the next two games
content: LSU has work to do after its 0-2 start in SEC play, but opportunity arrives with the season's most crucial two-game stretch.

title: Inside Washington's quiet collapse in 2025 and the decisions defining its offseason
content: Parting ways with Kliff Kingsbury was a bold move that raised the stakes for Dan Quinn & Co. this offseason.

title: From future HOF pitchers to a veteran catcher: Best fits for under-the-radar MLB free agents
content: Did your favorite team miss out on the biggest stars of this winter? Here are 15 players to sign instead.

title: Power Rankings: Where every team stands in the new year
content: Though there are still free agents to be signed, let's reassess the standings midway through the offseason.

title: Supercopa Clasico preview, predictions: Are Barcelona favorites vs. Real Madrid?
content: Barcelona and Real Madrid meet in the Supercopa final on Sunday, but who has the upper hand? Sam Marsden and Alex Kirkland preview the upcoming Clasico.

title: WNBA, WNBPA fail to reach new CBA at deadline
content: The WNBA and its players' union failed to agree to a new collective bargaining agreement or an extension of the previous one by Friday's 11:59 p.m. ET deadline.

title: 'We're all using it as motivation': LSU aims to shake off last season and win again
content: Last year, the defending champion Tigers were edged out of finals. Now they're back -- with a plan to win the national title again.

title: Jaguars' all teal, Panthers' all black lead NFL wild-card weekend uniforms
content: The NFL's wild-card round kicks off Saturday with multiple teams opting for traditional uniform combinations.

title: NFL wild-card round: Expect a tight game between 49ers and Eagles
content: Odds, game picks, prop plays, betting advice and daily fantasy tips for the 49ers-Eagles wild-card matchup.

title: The 2026 championship parlays: From conservative plays to huge potential payouts
content: We go on record picking this year's champions, beginning with the CFP and ending with the World Series.

title: Damroo in hand, 108 horses in procession: PM Modi takes part in ‚ÄòShaurya Yatra‚Äô at Somnath; offers puja
content: ‚Äã‚ÄãVisuals from the event showed the Prime Minister standing in an open, flower-adorned vehicle as the procession moved through the town. He was joined by Gujarat chief minister Bhupendra Patel and deputy chief minister Harsh Sanghavi. During the yatra, the Prime Minister was seen blowing a conch shell and greeting crowds that had gathered along the route.

title: Delhi horror: Woman, witness to husband's murder in 2023, shot dead; killed exact same way
content: In a chilling echo of her husband's murder, a woman was shot dead in Delhi, less than three years after he was killed in a personal rivalry. Police suspect one of the bike-borne assailants was also involved in the husband's murder, as the victim was a key witness.

title: What happened to Rishabh Pant? A blow-by-blow account
content: Rishabh Pant has been ruled out of the upcoming ODI series against New Zealand due to a side strain sustained during training. The wicketkeeper-batter suffered an oblique muscle tear after being hit by a delivery. This setback comes after his return from a toe fracture. Dhruv Jurel has been named as Pant‚Äôs replacement.

title: Who is Reza Pahlavi? Iran‚Äôs exiled crown prince urges protesters not to ‚Äòabandon the streets‚Äô
content: Widespread anti-government protests in Iran have entered their second week, escalating from economic grievances to calls for political change. Exiled crown prince Reza Pahlavi has re-emerged, urging protesters to remain on the streets and advocating for a secular, democratic transition.

title: Udaipur Leela Palace fined Rs 10 lakh: Staff entered occupied room with master key
content: A Chennai consumer court has ordered The Leela Palace, Udaipur, to pay over Rs 10.65 lakh in compensation and refund. The luxury hotel was found guilty of deficiency in service after a housekeeping staff member unlawfully entered an occupied room using a master key, causing severe mental trauma to a pregnant guest.

title: Microsoft AI CEO: We're building superintelligence backwards; need controls before trust
content: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman urges the industry to prioritize containment over alignment in AI development, warning against pursuing superintelligence without first ensuring control. He advocates for a "Humanist Superintelligence" approach, focusing on practical applications like medical AI and clean energy, to maintain human oversight and avoid uncontrolled autonomous systems.

title: Obscene images row: ‚ÄòX‚Äô admits ‚Äòmistake‚Äô; thousands of posts, over 600 accounts taken down
content: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) had raised concerns over obscene and harmful content allegedly generated by Elon Musk‚Äôs chatbot Grok. The ministry sent a letter to X (formerly Twitter), the social media website owned by Elon Musk, pointing out failures in moderating AI-generated content on its platform.

title: Suvendu Adhikari writes to EC; rejects Mamata Banerjee‚Äôs allegations on SIR
content: West Bengal's opposition leader Suvendu Adhikari has strongly refuted Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee's claims regarding the Special Intensive Revision of electoral rolls. Adhikari accused Banerjee of a politically motivated attempt to derail the process, which he stated is crucial for fair elections and has exposed vulnerabilities in the voter list.

title: Iran tense: Cyber expert warns of ‚Äòinternet kill switch‚Äô as protests intensify ‚Äî what it means
content: Iran faces a near-total internet blackout amid widespread anti-government protests, with connectivity plummeting to below 2% of normal levels. This "internet kill switch" is a deliberate move by authorities to curb communication, disrupt protest coordination, and limit coverage of alleged abuses by security forces. The severe shutdown, impacting essential services, is among the most extreme recorded in the country.

title: McKinsey's Sternfels on AI changing consulting: Non-client-facing roles shrinking, jobs growing are‚Ä¶
content: McKinsey is rapidly integrating AI, now employing 25,000 AI agents alongside 40,000 humans, with parity expected soon. This "25 squared" approach sees client-facing roles grow 25% while backend positions shrink, boosting output.  AI saves millions of hours annually on routine tasks, allowing consultants to focus on complex challenges and unique human skills like judgment and creativity.

title: Violent clash in Tripura: Shops torched, 5 injured after 'attempt to extort money' from truck driver
content: Violence erupted in Tripura's Unakoti district after an alleged extortion attempt on a timber truck driver. The incident led to five minor injuries and four shops being set ablaze. Authorities deployed a large security contingent and suspended internet services to control the escalating situation.

title: Exclusive: Dhruv Jurel joins India ODI squad as Rishabh Pant‚Äôs replacement ‚Äî IND vs NZ
content: In-form wicketkeeper-batter Dhruv Jurel has been drafted into India‚Äôs ODI squad as Rishabh Pant‚Äôs replacement after the latter was ruled out with a side strain. Jurel joins the team on the back of a prolific Vijay Hazare Trophy campaign, where he has scored 558 runs and led Uttar Pradesh to the top of Elite Group B.

title: China investigates Meta-Manus deal: Commerce ministry probes $2bn AI buy; Meta denies China links
content: Meta's acquisition of AI startup Manus, with Chinese roots, is under investigation by China for potential violations of technology export and outbound investment laws.  Despite Manus's move to Singapore and Meta's clarification on no continuing Chinese ownership, Beijing is scrutinizing the deal, citing the company's founding and parentage.

title: Haryana shocker: Junior hockey coach raped minor girl in stadium bathroom; arrested
content: A junior hockey coach in Rewari has been arrested for allegedly raping and impregnating a minor Class 12 student. The girl reported the incident, which occurred four months prior, leading to a miscarriage. An FIR was registered under the POCSO Act, and the accused coach is currently in police remand.

title: Chhattisgarh: Girl gang-raped by 5, including police van driver; 2 held, 3 still on the run
content: A 19-year-old girl was allegedly gang-raped by five men, including a Dial-112 driver, in Korba, Chhattisgarh. Police have apprehended two suspects, one being the driver, while three others are still at large. The incident, which occurred on Thursday night, has deeply embarrassed the police force. Investigations are ongoing, with teams actively pursuing the remaining accused.

title: Happy Lohri 2026: Top 50 wishes, messages, and quotes to share with your loved ones
content: Lohri 2026, on January 13th, celebrates the end of winter with bonfires, songs, and traditional delicacies, honoring harvest and longer days. This vibrant festival in northern India, especially Punjab, signifies gratitude, hard work, and intergenerational togetherness, marking the Sun's Capricorn entry and ushering in prosperity.

title: Vanessa Bryant thanks fans for braving rain at emotional Mamba book signing
content: Vanessa Bryant recently hosted a 'Mamba & Mambacita Forever' book signing, drawing large crowds despite rain. The event celebrated Kobe and Gianna Bryant's enduring legacy through art and community. Fans shared personal stories, highlighting how Vanessa's foundation continues to inspire and provide sports opportunities for underserved youth, honoring her family's memory.

title: Lauren Kyle confirms delay in Sports Club Atelier x Hockey Canada collection
content: Lauren Kyle, founder of Sports Club Atelier and wife of Connor McDavid, shared an update on her upcoming collaboration with Hockey Canada, confirming a slight delay in the launch. She emphasized the importance of getting every detail right. The collection follows the success of her earlier releases, which blend hockey culture with luxury streetwear.

title: Ayesha Curry promotes Jamaican tourism after devastating hurricane
content: Ayesha Curry is urging fans to support Jamaica's recovery from Hurricane Melissa by visiting the island. She highlighted that tourism is crucial for the Jamaican economy, with nearly 30% of the workforce dependent on it. Curry emphasized that a vacation serves as a donation, with airports and most hotels now operational.

title: The hot claims of cold water baths: Expert reveals truth, hype and real power of cold water plunges
content: Cold water baths have become a wellness trend, with many claiming significant health benefits. However, experts caution that while some short-term effects like increased alertness exist, many popular claims about immunity, fat burning, and overall health are exaggerated or lack scientific backing. A balanced approach and physician consultation are recommended, especially for those with pre-existing medical conditions.

title: Astrology forecasts major changes for 2026; six signs set to reinvent
content: 2026 is shaping up to be a year of reinvention! According to astrological insights, Capricorn, Scorpio, Aquarius, Aries, Leo, and Sagittarius will experience significant career evolutions, tackle personal obstacles, and open the door to new opportunities. This period promises a journey of self-discovery that boosts emotional resilience, enhances confidence, and fosters a positive view of the future.

title: Operation Hawkeye Strike: Video shows glimpse of US action in Syria; ISIS targets hit ‚Äî watch
content: US forces launched significant strikes across Syria targeting ISIS, a retaliatory move for a deadly December 13th ambush in Palmyra. The operation, named 'Hawkeye Strike,' directly responds to an ISIS attack that claimed the lives of two American soldiers and a civilian interpreter. This action underscores the US commitment to eradicating terrorist threats and protecting its personnel in the region.

title: ‚ÄòGenerals trying to deflect him‚Äô: Trump orders Greenland invasion plan ‚Äî what we know
content: Trump‚Äôs interest in Greenland may also be driven by domestic political considerations. With mid-term elections approaching later this year, there is concern that the president may seek a dramatic foreign policy move to divert attention from the US economy, amid fears Republicans could lose control of Congress to Democrats," the Mail reported, citing British diplomatic sources.

title: Drunk Bengaluru techie arrested after crashing into wall of Barbeque Nation; close shave for 6 people
content: A drunk software engineer narrowly missed hitting six pedestrians on a Bengaluru footpath when he lost control of his car and crashed into a restaurant wall. The 42-year-old techie, returning from a party, jumped a median and sped towards the Barbeque Nation restaurant. One person sustained injuries, and two vehicles were damaged in the incident.

title: Fadnavis arrest ‚Äòplot‚Äô: Maha top cop pushed for case against ex-DGP Sanjay Pandey
content: Former DGP Rashmi Shukla's pre-retirement report recommends FIRs against ex-DGP Sanjay Pandey and two others. They are accused of conspiring to implicate Devendra Fadnavis and Eknath Shinde in a 2016 ULC certificates scam. Shukla's report details alleged pressure on a businessman to falsely implicate the leaders.

title: 'Agar maar padh bhi jaati': Virat Kohli's powerful message to net bowler goes viral ‚Äîwatch
content: Virat Kohli's leadership shone during India's training camp as he motivated a local net bowler, emphasising conviction in bowling.  After an intense session, Kohli offered encouragement and signed a ball, demonstrating his commitment to developing talent and his own sharp form ahead of the ODI series.

title: 'Mini VK'! Virat Kohli meets his childhood lookalike; fans go wild ‚Äî watch
content: Virat Kohli's preparation for the ODI series against New Zealand in Vadodara was marked by intense net sessions and a heartwarming fan interaction. A young fan's striking resemblance to a younger Kohli drew widespread amusement online, with many dubbing him 'Mini VK'. Kohli continues his impressive ODI form, aiming to maintain momentum against the Blackcaps.

title: 'Why Cong leaders did not faced similar incarceration': Owaisi blames UPA regime for Umar, Sharjeel's detention
content: AIMIM chief Asaduddin Owaisi blamed the Congress for amendments to the UAPA during the UPA regime, stating they led to prolonged detentions of undertrials like Umar Khalid and Sharjeel Imam. He argued these changes expanded the definition of terrorism, facilitating extended custody without chargesheets, and alleged misuse against minorities.

title: Panic in Himachal: Tunnel work cracks Shimla homes; 15 families evacuated at 10 pm in 1¬∞C
content: Two residential buildings were evacuated near Shimla's Sanjauli after cracks appeared, allegedly due to tunnelling work. Around 40 people from 15 families were displaced amid freezing temperatures. Authorities suspended traffic on the bypass and initiated damage assessment and compensation processes.

title: 'ICE out for good‚Äô: Demonstrations erupt across the US after Renee Nicole Good‚Äôs fatal shooting
content: Protests erupted across the United States following the fatal shooting of Renee Nicole Good by an ICE agent in Minneapolis. Demonstrations, organized under the banner "ICE out for good," occurred in major cities and small towns, fueled by videos of the incident and differing accounts from state and federal officials.

title: 'I am pained by ...': Delhi CM Rekha Gupta on memes targeting her; what she said
content: Chief Minister Rekha Gupta expressed pain over AAP members using her verbal slips to attack her, alleging they cannot tolerate a woman leading the government. She also criticized Arvind Kejriwal's past promises and the transition to the 'Sheesh Mahal', while highlighting the government's efforts in public transport and pollution control.

title: 'The Raja Saab' Box Office, Day 2: Prabhas film sees big drop
content: Prabhas's 'The Raja Saab' experienced a significant box office drop on its second day, earning Rs 27.83 crore after a strong opening. The film has garnered Rs 90.73 crore net in India and Rs 138.4 crore worldwide in two days. While Telugu collections are robust, other language performances are lagging, and audience reviews highlight issues with storytelling and execution.

title: Did ICC suggest Hyderabad, Chennai as alternate venues to Bangladesh? BCB reveals
content: The concerns were raised after Bangladesh pacer Mustafizur Rahman was released by IPL franchise Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) on the instructions of the BCCI for unspecified reasons. This came amid reports of attacks on minorities in Bangladesh.

title: Dalit woman‚Äôs killer arrested in Haridwar; abducted daughter found
content: Police apprehended the alleged killer of a Dalit woman in Haridwar two days after her murder and her daughter's abduction in Meerut. The daughter was safely recovered. Political leaders attempting to visit the aggrieved family were reportedly stopped by security forces, while BJP politicians were allowed access.

title: ‚ÄòThey want to demolish BJP‚Äô: Bengal LoP accuses TMC workers of attacking his convoy; sits on dharna
content: West Bengal Leader of Opposition Suvendu Adhikari sat on a protest inside the Chandrakona police station, demanding registration of an FIR after he alleged that his convoy was attacked by Trinamool Congress workers at Paschim Medinipur on Saturday night.

title: 'Administered medicine through cannula': Chilling details pour out in Bengaluru doctor murder
content: Bengaluru police have filed a 2,322-page chargesheet against surgeon Dr. Mahendra Reddy in connection with his wife Dr. Krutika Reddy's death. Key evidence includes the accused's confession of administering medicine, traces of propofol found on the victim, and incriminating messages sent to a woman friend, establishing motive and a confession.

title: Kohli chose to play 'easiest format'? Gill gives verdict on Manjrekar's comment
content: Manjrekar‚Äôs view that ODI cricket is the easiest format has led to mixed reactions, especially with a three-match ODI series against New Zealand set to begin in Baroda on Sunday, January 11. India captain Shubman Gill responded to the discussion by pointing out that results do not support the idea that any format is easy.

title: US strikes Syria: America bombs ISIS to avenge Palmyra ambush; what we know so far
content: The United States launched large-scale retaliatory strikes against Islamic State targets across Syria following a deadly ambush near Palmyra that killed two US soldiers and an interpreter. These strikes, part of Operation Hawkeye Strike, aim to prevent future attacks and degrade ISIS capabilities, sending a strong warning to the terrorist group.

title: 'USA ready to help': Trump warns Iran amid rising protests
content: The Trump administration is reportedly exploring options for a potential attack on Iran, including large-scale airstrikes, amid escalating tensions. President Trump has issued stern warnings to Tehran regarding its crackdown on protesters. While no concrete plans are finalized, discussions involve targeting specific sites. Iran's Supreme Leader has accused the US of interference.

title: 'Dhurandhar' day 37: Ranveer Singh film mints Rs 5.75 crore on Sat
content: Ranveer Singh's spy thriller 'Dhurandhar' has enjoyed a dominant run, nearing Rs 800 crore domestically and over Rs 1200 crore globally. However, the film's reign is challenged by Prabhas's new release, 'The Raja Saab,' which has significantly outperformed 'Dhurandhar' in its opening days, signaling a shift in box office dominance.

title: 'Operation Hawkeye Strike': US carries out 'large-scale' airstrikes in Syria; targets ISIS
content: US and allied forces launched significant strikes across Syria targeting Islamic State positions. This decisive action, dubbed Operation Hawkeye Strike, serves as a direct retaliation for a recent deadly attack in Palmyra that claimed the lives of two American soldiers and a US civilian interpreter. CENTCOM vowed to pursue those responsible, emphasizing a zero-tolerance policy for attacks on their personnel.

title: T.N. Information Commission raps petitioner for abusing RTI Act¬†with excessive requests
content: Imposes penalty of ‚Çπ10,000 for using the Act as a tool to intimidate public authorities. The petitioner had filed 781 RTI petitions before the Principal District Judge, Theni.

title: Gauhati HC Bar Association sits on hunger strike, to boycott CJI's function for new complex
content: A new complex of the Gauhati High Court has been proposed as part of a judicial township at Rangmahal in North Guwahati and CJI, Justice Surya Kant, is scheduled to lay the foundation stone of it later in the day

title: Fog reduces visibility in parts of Punjab, Haryana
content: Bathinda was the coldest place in Punjab recording a minimum temperature of 1.6 degrees Celsius while Hisar, at a low of 2.2 degrees Celsius, was the coldest place in Haryana, according to the weather office

title: At least three killed, one injured as motorcycles collide head-on in Etah
content: Due to reduced visibility caused by dense fog, the drivers lost control near the turn, resulting in a head-on collision

title: Question paper row: Chhattisgarh school headmistress suspended, moderator faces dismissal
content: An English paper for Class IV exam included the question , "What is the name of Mona's dog?" with four options, with one of the options listed the name 'Ram'

title: Migration from Srikakulam, Vizianagaram to cities will decrease after Bhogapuram Airport construction: MP
content: ‚ÄúI have been receiving many petitions from youngsters for jobs during Praja Darbars being conducted in different places of Vizianagaram Assembly Constituency. Their dreams will become a reality very soon as all developmental activities are set to take off in the year 2026 itself,‚Äù says Vizianagaram Parliament Member

title: Air quality a nationwide crisis, government response exceedingly ineffective: Congress
content: A new analysis by the Centre for Research on Energy and Clean Air (CREA) has now confirmed what was always India's "worst-kept secret that the air quality is a nation-wide, structural crisis for which the government response is exceedingly ineffective and inadequate", Congress leader Jairam Ramesh said

title: Crude glycerin leakage from container hits traffic in Thane for over two hours
content: ‚ÄúContainer truck carrying 25 tonnes of crude glycerin belonging to a private company was travelling from Ambernath in the district to Gujarat when the liquid began leaking from it and spilled onto the road surface,‚Äù says Thane disaster management cell chief

title: Kashmir in grip of cold wave, Shopian coldest place at minus 8.6 degrees Celsius
content: Kashmir is currently in the midst of 'Chilla-i-Kalan', 40 days of extreme cold, during which night temperatures often drop several degrees below the freezing point, and the chances of snowfall are the highest

title: Two militants held in connection with recent firing incidents in Manipur
content: ‚ÄúThe two members of the proscribed KCP (Noyon) were apprehended on January 10 from Sagolband and Phumlou areas in the district,‚Äù says a senior officer

title: Months-long under-the-radar investigation paved the way for Mamkootathil‚Äôs arrest
content: Officials said a third ‚Äúme-too‚Äù disclosure, received by Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan‚Äôs office last year and processed secretly by the police over the past few months, helped investigators legally circumvent the interim protection from arrest Mr Mamkootathil had obtained from the High Court in two earlier rape and coerced termination of pregnancy cases.¬†

title: PM Modi leads Shaurya yatra; dazzling lights, drone, devotion pull massive crowd to Somnath
content: Thousands of devotees thronged the Somnath temple complex on January 10, 2026, staying out well past midnight braving winter chills

title: Biting cold grips Delhi as minimum temperature dips below 4.1¬∞C at isolated places
content: Delhi‚Äôs Air Quality Index (AQI) stood at 295, in the ‚Äúpoor‚Äù category, at 9 a.m., the Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) data showed.

title: FIR filed to identify 'VIPs' in Ankita Bhandari murder case
content: The FIR was lodged at the Vasant Vihar police station in Dehradun on a complaint filed by Padma Bhushan-awarded environmentalist Anil Prakash Joshi to the Director General of Police

title: Owaisi targets Congress over UAPA, denial of bail to Khalid and Imam
content: ‚ÄúThe people who talk of secularism during elections are in fact enemies of Muslims, Dalits, and tribals, as they use political secularism to gain votes,‚Äù says the AIMIM chief

title: In Frames: Kathputli ‚Äî pulling strings in Jaipur‚Äôs puppet colony
content: In this Jaipur corner, nearly 250 families carry forward one of Rajasthan‚Äôs oldest folk art forms, Kathputli; these artisans sew bright costumes onto small wooden puppets that are used by travelling performers who narrate tales of Rajput kings, warriors, folk heroes, and moral stories

title: Expelled Congress MLA Rahul Mamkootathil arrested from hotel room in Palakkad in sexual assault case
content: Around midnight on January 10, the police team surprised Mr. Mamkootathil by waking him from his room number 2002 and placing him under arrest

title: Flag bearers of secularism silent on violence in Bangladesh, says U.P. CM Yogi
content: The U.P. CM added those dividing society today can never be well-wishers of the nation and cautioned people from opposition parties

title: Junior hockey coach arrested for raping minor in Haryana‚Äôs Rewari
content: The victim said that she became pregnant due to the rape and on January 5, she suffered a miscarriage and was admitted to a hospital by her family after her health deteriorated

title: BJP and JD(S) accuse Congress of misleading people on VB-G RAM G scheme, welcome special session
content: The alliance partners said they would take the issue to the village level to counter the ‚Äòmisinformation‚Äô being spread by the Congress

title: Blogger missing for a week, family appeals CM for help
content: Pranab Das, 23, a resident of Malaya Nagar Nepali Para under the Srinagar police station limits in West Tripura district, has remained untraced since January 3

title: January weather system to influence heavy rainfall in parts of coastal districts on Sunday
content: Coastal places like Chennai experienced nippy weather, strong surface winds interspersed with light rainfall on Saturday owing to the wind influence that brought moisture from Bay of Bengal

title: Why was bail denied to Umar and Sharjeel? | Explained
content: Why did the Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act bail bar prevail against Umar Khalid and Sharjeel Imam? Why were the two student activists on a ‚Äòqualitatively different footing‚Äô, according to the top court? How does the verdict mark a departure from judicial precedent?

title: INDIA bloc taking contradictory positions on SIR, says BJP
content: BJP MP and national spokesperson Sudhanshu Trivedi said that the Opposition parties seemed unsure about their own position, with their leaders changing their claims about the impact of the exercise

title: Forest teams monitor movement of elephants in Vellore
content: The drive comes in the wake of a herd of elephants reportedly destroying large tracts of farmlands in areas like Rajiv Gandhi Nagar and Indira Nagar near Panamadangi RF for the past few days

title: Majnu Komath, architect of struggle for Goshree Bridges, passes away
content: He served as chairman of the Ernakulam-Vypeen Bridges Action Council, formed in the 1980s, and remained steadfast in the struggle until the bridges became a reality in 2004

title: Congress does not believe in ‚Äòbackdoor politics‚Äô, says Selvaperunthagai
content: Clarifying the party‚Äôs position on alliances, he says seat-sharing talks in Tamil Nadu are being handled by a committee appointed by the party high command and led by Girish Chodankar

title: Anbumani urges T.N. government to hold talks with Livelihood Mission workers, fill headmaster vacancies
content: The PMK leader says the workers‚Äô repeated demands for salary revision and service regularisation have been ignored, forcing them to launch a sit-in protest

title: Stalin urges Modi to consult States before finalising caste enumeration rules for Census
content: Caste enumeration is a sensitive matter that touches upon deep-rooted social dynamics and has the potential to cause unintended societal tensions if not handled with utmost care, says T.N. Chief Minister

title: Set aside political differences for development of capital city: Governor
content: Meeting with Thiruvananthapuram Corporation councillors, Rajendra Arlekar underscores the importance of dedication and efficient implementation for development

title: Avakai‚ÄìAmaravati festival concludes on grand note in Vijayawada
content: Three-day celebration of cinema, culture and literature draws over 7,000 visitors on final day; next edition set for December 2026

title: A Owaisi's 'Tubelight' Jab At Himanta Sarma Amid 'Hijab-Clad PM' Remark Row
content: AIMIM chief Asaduddin Owaisi hit out at Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma as their war of words, that began over the former's remark that a woman wearing a hijab would become the prime minister of India, intensified.

title: "Alliance Of Survival": Poonam Mahajan Targets Thackeray Brothers On NDTV
content: BJP leader and former MP Poonam Mahajan took a swipe at the coming together of the Thackeray brothers, describing their alliance as one driven by political compulsion, while asserting that voters are aware of its real intent.

title: Victim Of Rape-Accused Expelled MLA Posts Emotional Message After Arrest
content: After the arrest of Expelled Congress MLA Rahul Mamkootathil in a fresh sexual assault case, the woman who had first lodged a complaint against him posted an emotional message on her social media account on Sunday.

title: Medical Horror In Indore: Infant's Thumb Accidentally Severed By Nurse
content: A case of major medical irresponsibility has emerged from Madhya Pradesh's Indore, where a one-and-a-half-month-old infant admitted to a hospital suffered a serious injury after a nurse accidentally severed the baby's thumb.

title: 'Iran Looking At Freedom Like Never Before': Trump Vows US Support
content: President Donald Trump said Saturday that the United States is "ready to help" as protesters in Iran faced an intensifying crackdown by authorities of the Islamic republic.

title: How Iran's Economic Protests Turned Deadly: A Timeline
content: Demonstrations broke out in Iran on December 28 and have spread nationwide as protesters vent their increasing discontent over the Islamic Republic's faltering economy and the collapse of its currency.

title: Iran Sees Fresh Protests, Nationwide Internet Shutdown Continues
content: Anti-government chants filled the streets of Iran's capital on Saturday night, as protesters pressed the biggest movement against the Islamic republic in more than three years despite a deadly crackdown under cover of an internet blackout.

title: 108 Horses, Massive Crowd: PM Modi Takes Part In 'Shaurya Yatra' At Somnath
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi participated in the 'Shaurya Yatra' at Somnath Temple as part of the Somnath Swabhiman Parv in Gujarat on Sunday. He witnessed cultural performances from artists across the country.

title: Double Trouble For Delhi: 'Poor' AQI, Yellow Alert For Dense Fog, Cold Wave
content: The IMD has issued a yellow alert for dense fog and warned of a cold wave in Delhi-NCR for Sunday and Monday, cautioning that weather conditions are likely to worsen over the next two days amid a sharp drop in temperatures.

title: Opinion: Opinion | The Political Potency Of 'Parasakthi': Box Office, Ballot Box, And Beyond
content: Parasakthi is not merely a film set against history; it is history weaponised for the present. From its very first frame, the movie announces its political intent, rooting itself firmly in the anti-Hindi imposition agitations of the 1950s and 60s.

title: 44-Year-Old Delhi Woman, Witness To Husband's Murder In 2023, Shot Dead
content: A 44-year-old woman was shot dead at point-blank range in northwest Delhi's Shalimar Bagh on Saturday, with police suspecting the killing to be a fallout of the 2023 murder of her husband, an official said.

title: Nicaragua Frees Dozens Of Prisoners After Trump's Pressure
content: Nicaragua's authoritarian government said Saturday it had freed "tens" of detainees, following US pressure and a week after American forces seized Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro, a close Managua ally.

title: Trump Proposes 1-Year, 10%  Cap On Credit Card Interest Rates
content: Reviving a campaign pledge, President Donald Trump wants a one-year, 10% cap on credit card interest rates, a move that could save Americans tens of billions of dollars but drew immediate opposition from an industry that has been in his corner.

title: Myanmar Junta Opens Polls In Second Phase Of Elections Amid Criticism
content: Myanmar's junta opened polls on Sunday in the second phase of elections, continuing a vote democracy watchdogs say is letting the military prolong its rule in a civilian guise.

title: "We're Living In Fear": Thousands March After Immigration Shootings In US
content: Thousands of people marched in Minneapolis Saturday to protest the fatal shooting of a woman by a federal immigration officer there and the shooting of two protesters in Portland, Oregon, as Minnesota leaders urged demonstrators to remain peaceful.

title: Rape-Accused Expelled MLA Rahul Mamkootathil Arrested, Faces 3rd Complaint
content: Rahul Mamkootathil, an MLA from the Congress in Kerala's Palakkad who was expelled following rape accusations, was taken into police custody early Sunday. Mamkootathil was taken into custody at around 12.30 am from the KPM Regency Hotel in Palakkad.

title: Somnath Temple Stands As Beacon Of Eternal Divinity, Says PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday said that the Somnath Temple in Gujarat is a timeless symbol of divine presence and continues to guide generations.

title: "Never Forget": Trump Claims Credit As Venezuela Frees Political Prisoners
content: US President Donald Trump said Venezuela has begun the process of releasing political prisoners, claiming the move was carried out "in a big way" following US action against the Venezuelan leadership.

title: Students shocked over closing of Vaishno Devi medical college in Jammu over ‚Äòpoor infrastructure‚Äô
content: The Shri Mata Vaishno Devi Medical College, one of the ambitious projects of J&K, registered its first batch on the National Eligibility cum Entrance Test (NEET) ranking in October-November 2024; out of 50 MBBS seats, 42 Muslim students, mostly from Kashmir, qualified for the college

title: Centre to focus on 100 high-risk districts to cut road accident deaths
content: Zero-fatalities programme has already been rolled out in 20 districts in Uttar Pradesh, 19 in Tamil Nadu, 11 in Maharashtra, and nine in Karnataka

title: Somnath is symbol of ‚Äòcivilisational courage‚Äô, says PM Modi
content: Starting his three-day visit to Gujarat, PM Modi witnessed a drone show and presided over a meeting of the Shree Somnath Trust as its chairman

title: Naidu vows to bring world‚Äôs top universities to Amaravati
content: Chief Minister says capital already hosts reputed private universities, highlights focus on quantum, AI and higher education growth at Siddhartha Academy golden jubilee celebrations

title: Self-reliance in defence is crucial for India‚Äôs strategic autonomy: Defence Secretary
content: ‚ÄòEvolving global supply chains and rapidly advancing technologies present both challenges and unprecedented opportunities for India‚Äôs defence sector,‚Äô says Rajesh Kumar Singh

title: Congress launches 45-day ‚ÄòMGNREGA Bachao Sangram‚Äô against new rural jobs legislation
content: The campaign seeks the restoration of MGNREGA in its original form as a rights-based legislation guaranteeing employment, strengthening the role of panchayats, and ensuring accountability

title: China will have half of newly-diagnosed Parkinson‚Äôs disease cases in the next decade: Nobel Laureate
content: In 2030, it is estimated that 8.7 million individuals will be affected by Parkinson‚Äôs, of which 57% will be from China, 14% from Europe, 8% from India, 7% from the U.S., 4% from Brazil, and 10% others

title: At pre-Budget meet, Thangam Thennarasu flags GST losses, seeks release of pending dues
content: He also urges the Centre to reconsider the Metro Rail proposals for Madurai and Coimbatore, saying that the grounds cited for their rejection were inconsistent with those cited for the approval granted to the projects in other cities

title: AAP holds protests in Punjab against circulation of Atishi's 'doctored' video
content: An FIR has been registered in the matter, and a forensic examination ‚Äòconfirmed deliberate manipulation‚Äô of the clip, the party says

title: Eminent citizens being harassed during SIR, Mamata writes again to CEC
content: It is a matter of profound shame that Nobel Laureate Prof. Amartya Sen-a nonagenarian and a globally respected intellectual, has been asked to appear before ECI officials to establish his credentials, Ms . Banerjee wrote in the letter

content: Request for Proposal has been issued to invite private participation for development, operation, and maintenance under a long-term concession framework

title: Elderly people share slew of concerns as govt. panel seeks to set priorities
content: Over 150 people representing senior citizen forums and voluntary organisations put together their concerns and suggestions at a hearing held by the Kerala State Elderly Commission

title: Police foil Somasila visit, place YSRCP leaders under house arrest
content: Kakani Govardhan Reddy accuses CM N. Chandrababu Naidu of secret Telangana pact over scrapped Rayalaseema irrigation scheme

title: UDF, BJP campaign against Left over Sabarimala lost its relevance, says CPI
content: The party said the State government has fully cooperated with the investigation; those who tried to steal the wealth of the temple should be treated as culprits

title: Consider Romeo-Juliet clause in POCSO to protect adolescent relationships, Supreme Court tells Centre
content: Abuse of POCSO, especially by families objecting to romantic involvement among teenagers, has become common, says court; orders the judgment copy to be given to Law Secretary to take steps to ‚Äòcurb this menace‚Äô

title: SIT conducts protracted search and seizure operation at Sabarimala senior Tantri‚Äôs private residence in Chengannur
content: Officials say the SIT reportedly focussed on creating an inventory of artefacts, including gold ornaments, in Rajeevaru‚Äôs possession to audit their provenance and confiscate the objects, including bank statements and legal documents, pertaining to the case

title: A.P. Deputy CM Pawan Kalyan urges doctors to visit tribal pockets once a month
content: Pawan performs bhumi puja for construction of buildings and labs at Rangaraya Medical College and lauds alumni for raising  ‚Çπ11.10 crore for the purpose

title: Union Budget 2026-27: Kerala‚Äôs wish-list includes ‚ÄòSpecial Fiscal Correction Package,‚Äô defence innovation corridor, revenue protection measures under GST
content: State reiterates demand for AIIMS, Sabari Rail, special package for return migrants and aid for paddy and rubber sectors

title: Balan refuses to apologise to Jamaat-e-Islami
content: Jamaat-e-Islami had sent the senior CPI(M) leader a legal notice against defamatory remarks, seeking an apology and ‚Çπ1 crore in compensation

title: Centre should share surcharge collections with States: Bhatti
content: Mr. Bhatti Vikramarka made a strong pitch for enhanced fiscal space for States, greater devolution of resources and early sanction of major infrastructure projects

title: Manipur fuel outlets shut down demanding security after bomb attacks
content: In a letter to Governor Ajay Kumar Bhalla, the State‚Äôs petroleum dealers said they have been facing severe threats despite steps taken for their safety

title: Palliative care needs to be integrated into dentistry, says M.R.¬†Rajagopal
content: Pallium India has launched a new Department of Palliative Care Dentistry in Thiruvananthapuram, aimed at addressing the often-overlooked oral health challenges faced by head and neck cancer survivors.

title: CWC orders probe into allegation of teacher‚Äôs sexual abuse of students
content: The police arrested the teacher after he allegedly abused a Class VI student at his quarters, reportedly after giving the child liquor

title: ONGC completes capping of Mori-5 well in Konaseema in five days
content: A major blowout of natural gas was reported in Mori-5 well during workover activity aimed at increasing the flow of the natural gas on January 5

title: One dead, six hospitalised after inhaling carbon monoxide in Dharwad
content: The incident came to light after their colleague visited their room to check after repeated calls went unanswered

title: Arrangements in place for Makaravilakku festival
content: Virtual Queue bookings capped at 35,000 for January 13 and 30,000 for January 14, the festival day. Only those with valid Virtual Queue bookings will be allowed darshan, say police. As part of traffic management, restrictions will be imposed on pilgrims‚Äô movement

title: ISRO‚Äôs Aditya-L1 decodes how solar storms impact Earth‚Äôs magnetic field
content: The study used observations from Aditya-L1, India‚Äôs first solar observatory, along with data from other international space missions to decode the impact of a massive eruption of solar plasma from the Sun

title: CPI(M), Congress, and BJP draw battle lines over Sabarimala theft, Jamaat-e-Islami Hind, and religious fundamentalism
content: CPI(M) will launch mass movement against schismatic politics, BJP will observe Makaravilakku season as faith protection month, while Congress will spotlight LDF‚Äôs ‚Äòrightward drift to Hindutva politics‚Äô

title: Quack arrested in Tirupattur
content: A special medical team conducted a surprise check in the house after health officials got complaints from residents

title: NH-65 under drone surveillance as Sankranti traffic from Hyderabad peaks
content: Panthangi Toll Plaza, which typically handles between 15,000 and 20,000 vehicles a day, is seeing a a fourfold rise in traffic as festive travel surges

content: Recon Expo 2026, projected as North Karnataka‚Äôs largest interior design and construction materials exhibition, which began in Hubballi on Friday and witnessed a higher visitor turnout on Saturday.

title: 20 crore routed to I-PAC Goa office from Kolkata via hawala: ED
content: ED said proceeds of crime generated from alleged coal smuggling in west Bengal were routed through domestic and international hawala channels and used to fund political campaigns . one such transfer reached I-PAC during goa assembly elections in 2021-22, the agency claims .

title: Transfer rumors, news: Demb√©l√© to turn down PSG extension
content: Ousmane Demb√©l√© is set to reject a new contract offer from Paris Saint-Germain . the 28-year-old is currently in the final two years of his current PSG contract . despite being offered a deal which would see him earn ‚Ç¨30m per year, the forward is holding out for double that amount .

title: Ja Morant trade guide: Four proposals for Memphis -- if it can find a suitor
content: sources tell ESPN's Shams Charania that a trade would end the franchise's tumultuous seven-year tenure in Memphis . the 26-year-old is averaging career lows in minutes, rebounds and 2- and 3-point percentages . he was suspended earlier this season for conduct detrimental to the team .

title: How Liam Coen got the Jaguars to the playoffs: 'It makes us want to fight for him'
content: coach Liam Coen previews his team's playoff matchup vs. Josh Allen and the Bills . he delivers an energetic fist pump and an emphatic "How's that feel?" it's a phrase his father, Tim, used after victories as a college and high school coach in Rhode Island . players and coaches love it, too .

title: Ranking the best players in the college football transfer portal
content: the offseason transfer portal window for college football players opens at midnight ET on Jan. 2 . there's no spring transfer period this year, so teams have one big chance to get their rosters right for 2026 . here are ESPN's rankings of the top players in the portal .

title: The 10 teams that have gotten off to the hottest portal starts
content: college football's offseason transfer window opened one week ago . a dozen FBS programs have secured commitments from 20 or more players in the portal . there are 10 programs off to impressive starts in building up their rosters for 2026 .

title: WNBA CBA Q&A: Nneka Ogwumike, Napheesa Collier on 'standstill'
content: the WNBA CBA is scheduled to expire at 11:59 p.m. ET on friday . the league and its players union will likely enter into a stage of "status quo" a work stoppage or lockout can be declared without notice . sources say negotiations have netted minimal progress .

title: NFL's best QB room? How Mac Jones and Brock Purdy helped each other to the playoffs
content: quarterback Brock Purdy was preparing for the 49ers' playoff matchup against the Eagles . he'd reclaim the role as long as he was healthy enough to play near the standard he set on his way to landing a $265 million contract in may .

title: Semifinal takeaways: Utter dominance has become the norm for Indiana
content: Texas, Penn State and Clemson were among the preseason national title favorites . the hoosiers and Hurricanes will play in the CFP national championship on Jan. 19 in the Hard Rock Stadium . they will play for their first title since 2001 .

title: Rams stave off Panthers in wild-card thriller to advance
content: the Rams have advanced to the divisional round of the playoffs for the second year in a row . the los Angeles Rams beat the Carolina Panthers 34-31 on saturday . quarterback Matthew Stafford said he would like to not throw it to their team .

title: MLB offseason grades: Cubs nab Bregman on five-year deal
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here, and we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . if it's a big-money free agent signing that changes the course of your team's future or a blockbuster trade, check back in for the freshest analysis through spring training .

title: Inside the day the Ravens moved on from Harbaugh, and what's next for Baltimore
content: it seems no one inside the Baltimore Ravens ' training facility had conviction that Tuesday would become the most shocking day in franchise history . the belief inside the building was that the Ravens would undergo staff changes, perhaps at the coordinator positions, but that Harbaugh would remain the head coach in 2026 .

title: Caleb Williams, Bears stun Packers again with wild-card win
content: the Bears are the fourth team in NFL history to win a playoff game after trailing by 15-plus entering the fourth quarter . the bears' 18-point halftime deficit was the team's largest ever in a home playoff game . despite unsuccessful fourth-down attempts, the Packers knew what they were capable of .

title: CFP National Championship first look: Previewing Miami-Indiana
content: 136 teams hope to taste postseason glory . a champion will be crowned in a matchup . the team will face off at 7:30 p.m. ET on january 19 . it's the first time the team has won the title game in 2025 .

title: NFL wild-card round's best arrivals, featuring Jaylon Johnson, Bryce Young
content: the calendar flipped to January and the NFL has flipped into playoff mode . the sack ruling separates Jared Allen and Myles Garrett from myles Garrett Kevin Seifert newest layer in the Packers-Bears rivalry .

title: Clock is ticking for Tottenham's Frank, with dwindling evidence he deserves extra time
content: 2-1 home defeat to aston villa ended their FA Cup campaign at the earliest possible opportunity . the previous Tottenham hotspur head coach survived last season by having a trophy to play for . however, he thinks his side should not get away with blaming injury .
